Reviews.Title: Awesome quality!
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: The camera was straight forward to hookup even without the instructions and I was surprised how durable it is. It is an excellent camera in both day and night. The image is very nice. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice cheap backup camera.

Reviews.Title: Works OK but all have failed in about 1 year
Reviews.Author: Gary Fortelney
Reviews.Content: Camera quality it OK for the the price.I bought five of these less than a year ago and all them have failed. Half of the IR lights have quit working on four of the five and the last one no longer gives a picture the IR lights work but that is it (probably because it only lasted about 6 months before I replaced it).  I ended replacing all the units with another manufacturer for less cost, higher resolution 600 TVL compared to these with 420 TVL and they also have a one year warranty, compared to these that have a 30 day warranty.I would stay away from all VideoSecu products unless you feel like replacing them every year.

Reviews.Title: Half Works
Reviews.Author: Old
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera now for about 5 days.Pros:  It's wider screen than I expected, something along the line of 120 degree field of view. That's a big plusfor my requirements.  It has a good quality for a lower priced camera. Easy to install, IR's seem to work out to about 20 ft.Cons: It NEVER switches to black and white, even in a totally blacked out room.  It does pick up some stars and flying aircraftlights at night.  It has a defective pixels so that at night it looks like stars.The sun cover/shade works ok for shielding the lens from the sun but at night it is a total failure. The IR leds reflect backfrom the sun shade and leaves you with a white/gray screen.  You can only use the camera at night if you remove the sun shadefrom the camera. I tried taping black mat paper and black felt onto the bottom of the sun shade but the camera still isn't useable.The first problem appears to be a defect in switching to black and white at night.  The second problem is a design flaw. That's why moreexpensive camera use black non-reflective paint near the lens pickup area.I will not be buying this brand again.OK, rated this at 3 stars. Now I am rating it a 1. I would rate it a negative if I could.Today about 2 weeks after I received the camera it quit. All I get out of the camera now is streaks and tearing white lines.So It's junk, don't buy it.
